programme.title: FINDING CALLARO
programme.desc: The once beautiful and lush Planet Kepler is now dry and near death, after its precocious Callaro plant was exploited to extinction by Earthers because the Callaro plant was known throughout the galaxy as a source of super energy. In this outer space 3-D animated adventure reminiscent of JIMMY NEUTRON and AVATAR, three brave Kepler SpaceKids, Axel, Jono, and Gaga, want to rebuild their desolate planet by following the ancient legend of the lost Callaro oasis. Axel leads his friends into danger as they battle evil Earthers, giant spaceships, and destructive Robots as they journey down the depths of a volcano to retrieve the last Callaro seed and try to save the planet.

programme.title: ALICE DIZ
programme.desc: Daniel is a young loner who starts an online relationship with Alice, an unknown woman. Despite never having seen her, he falls in love to the point of obsession. But Alice has a secret. The Revelation of a surprising truth sends Daniel into despair, setting off a series of events that take the characters along mysterious, dangerous paths, from which there is no return

programme.title: DO IT IN POST
programme.desc: Comedy about the horrors of shooting a low budget feature in modern day Miami and everything that that can possible go wrong on set. The story is told through the eyes of Alex Gonzalez, a pothead who is kidnapped by his best friend Chris during a minor drug transaction and forced to be a PA on the set of an ultra low budget movie. Alex has no idea what a PA does or what it takes to make a movie but he has common sense, which is lacking heavily on this set. Chris promises Alex that hell drive him home as soon as they get the first shot completed; but for this feature, getting anything in the can is a major task.

programme.title: PATH TO THE DREAM
programme.desc: Ex youth Kung Fu champion Sheng who works for a local Mafia gang, has met his brother, Ming, after years of running away from home. Knowing Ming is still fighting for their dream of winning the martial arts tournament, Sheng has started questioning his life choice. Meanwhile, his struggle becomes more complicated after learning the secret of the Mafia boss. This time there is no turning back.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 24
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. programme.title: Bun For The Road
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in a sprightly mood, his head zinging with ideas for a fresh menu but just as he is about to jot them on the blackboard, a throat clears behind him. Chai Raja turns to find a beaming salesman selling buns who wants Chai Raja to take a trial batch of his buns. Chai Raja doesnt much care for the pushy salesman from the start, but really loses his temper when the salesman implies that his buns are better than Chai Rajas fritters. An incensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to take care of the salesman so that he himself can get on with the days menu, as customers have started coming. Sundar immediately gets his guard face on and sends the salesman scuttling though little does he know that the stubborn guy has snuck back into the yard and is keeping an eye out for an opportunity to thrust his trial buns in Chai Rajas face. The salesman spots Basha neatly outwitting Sundar and decides to recruit the latter to worm his way into Chai Rajas presence- the salesman wants to prove his point and force Chai Raja to buy his buns. Basha expecting fritters as payment accepts and gets to work distracting Sundar. The salesman sneaks in and starts switching the snacks and soon Chai Raja faces foul-tempered customers who point at their plates in protest. Sundar is immediately summoned and given an earful- a confused Sundar suddenly spots the lurking salesman and realizes who the saboteur is. A chase ensues made hilarious by Bashas intervention that Chai Raja ends by landing a griddle splat on the salesmans hindquarters and sending him flying. Basha is left fritter-less but then spots the suitcase of buns that the salesman dropped

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: ALLY-GATOR
programme.desc: Once a spooky-looking biologist comes to the teashop to have tea. He opens a box and starts doing some things into it (arranging eggs, or feathers or studying specimens). He is also having his tea. Once he finishes the drink, the old man leaves. But Sundar notices a thing fall from his box. By the time Sundar runs to the door, the man is gone. The thing looks like a shiny stone. Sundar is about to add the stone to his box of trinkets when Basha swoops in and snatches the box away. Sundar chases after Basha and they collide and the box flies open and the shiny stone falls out. Much to Sundars wonder (as well as Basha who sneaks up), the stone starts to crack. It is actually an egg. It cracks open and out pops a mischievous little alligator who gets a giggle out of messingg with the customers. The baby-alligator is literally after Sundar calling him Mama. A thunderous Chai Raja orders Sundar to get his alligator under control- which is made even more impossible thanks to Bashas meddling. But the twist happens when the baby-dragon starts calling Basha Papa! The shop looks straight out of a disastrous war movie when much to Sundars and Bashas relief, the absent minded biologist turns up and in a trice, tames the naughty alligator. But all doesnt end well as Sundars single sigh of relief is all that it takes to bring down the teetering shop to a pile of wood and leaves!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Beach Boys

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Much ado about poo
programme.desc: YOYO visit a park for dogs that is ruined by pooches fouling on the grass which their owners cant be bothered to clear up

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Is that dog trained?
programme.desc: Ragoo gets off the lead in a fantasy world and the twins have to train him.

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: Dinosaur crossing
programme.desc: A young prehistoric boy is struggling with a dinosaur that in its frantic race threatens to overwhelm all. With the help of a chameleon, the twins will help the boy to resolve the situation.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Bottle Cap
programme.desc: Small yet that doesnt stop our DIY geniuses from coming up with something fun

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: Water, Water Every Where
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Gelatina
programme.desc: It is Fridays “Date of Manufacture” (birthday), and Fred tries to make it great. Brains has an emergency when her old, and difficult-to-control pet comes to find her. Gelatina is a gooey blob who can morph into any disguise.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: The Guide’s Servant – Ali Baba
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her crazy assistant FO travel into the story of ALI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES, having been called out by ALI BABA’S WIFE. A week ago, ALI went to the forest to cut wood and he still hasnt returned. The detective and her assistant go into the cave of the 40 thieves and discover that AALI BABA has been taken prisoner, condemned to clean their enormous treasure for the rest of his days. SANDRA and FO release ALI, but before they have time to escape the THIEVES return to their cave. The detective leads ALI BABA and her assistant on a perilous journey through the bowels of the earth, following the enigmatic tracks of an ancient traveller, the sailor AL IDRISI.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: Ese hombre, esa mujer
programme.desc: Dmitri no se compromete con nadie, hasta que conoce a Dora y entiende que el amor a primera vista es real.

programme.title: Ese hombre, esa mujer

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940

programme.title: popeye meets ali baba's forty thieves (1080)
Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: to duck or not to duck (1920x1080)
Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Space Thunder Kids 1991
programme.desc: Three children pilots fight against the Dark Empire on their mission to destroy the universe.

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words "THE END."

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Guest Joshua Rothman
programme.desc: Slavery is America's dirty little secret, which is why there's so many misconceptions and misinformation that's in history books and circling around society today. The hierarchy of slavery, the business that it took to make it work and become successful, and the slave societies that thrived as a result of it are all not often talked about. Listen in to a fascinating conversation with Joshua Rothman, author and professor at the University of Alabama, that starts with the origins of slavery, to the ships, and then to the plantation. Regardless of which part you look at, a slave trader was involved every step of the way.

programme.title: Filmmaker Nailah Jefferson speaks about her digital shorts series.
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Diamond D
programme.desc: Diamond D is a Hip-Hop legend. Rapper, producer, and lover of the culture. I love talking the people who help create the culture every day.

programme.title: Guest Chris Rob
programme.desc: Recording artist Chris Rob talks about his LA Fires benefit concert at City Winery in NYC.

programme.title: Filmmaker Nailah Jefferson on her new documentary, "Donyale Luna: Supermodel."
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Styles P
programme.desc: Styles P from the LOX is a legendary rapper who’s become a wellness entrepreneur. He’s got a lot of Juices For Life stores in NY. We talk about that as well as everything from the rise of the LOX and how they met to the time he roughed up Diddy in his office.

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - Vegan Bacon, Twizzlers and an Antioxidant Salad
programme.desc: Love Bacon? Try Vegan—Tasty, Healthier, and Better for Pigs!

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - Buffalo Cauliflower Wings with Lauren Toyota!
programme.desc: Make the Switch from Chicken Wings to Cauliflower Wings—You Won't Regret It

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - Avocado Toast Contest with Avantgarde Vegan
programme.desc: Who Can Resist a Cooking Contest—Especially with Avocado Toast Center Stage!

programme.title: Highway to Health - Kevin Smith at Crossroads LA
programme.desc: Famed actor/director Kevin Smith reveals how he went vegan after almost dying of a heart attack.

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Beans & Beginnings
programme.desc: Beans & Beginnings - Think tofu is boring? Think again.

programme.title: At Home with the Jenners: Tomatoes & (rescued) Chickens
programme.desc: A garden-fresh tomato tart that'll make you forget it's vegan!

programme.title: Kale Krew - Runaway Cow Ice Cream
programme.desc: Visit a cool vegan ice cream shop on Chicago's South Side with a delicious backstory.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Spirit Elephant
programme.desc: Kale Krew stars visit Spirit Elephant, a gourmet vegan restaurant in Winnetka, IL, near Chicago.

programme.title: Moving towards Humanity's Redemption!
programme.desc: Hundreds gathered as LA's infamous Farmer John pig slaughterhouse shut down for good.

programme.title: Farm Sanctuary - What It Takes to Care!
programme.desc: This video gives us an insight into the hard work it takes to care for the animals at Farm Sanctuary

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Tour Los Angeles
programme.desc: Los Angeles... Hollywood... movies, movie stars, red carpets...and food!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Mexico City's Going Vegan!
programme.desc: Mexico City has one of the biggest vegan scenes anywhere! Rated V for Vegan's Eunice Reyes shows us!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Toronto, Canada's Vegan Scene
programme.desc: Visit Canada's biggest city and get a handle on its astounding vegan restaurant scene.

programme.title: Creature in the Dark
programme.desc: After strange creatures arrive, a husband waiting for the return of his wife, must adjust to being sole caretaker of his young daughter, while dealing with what is in his basement...

programme.title: Baby Doll
programme.desc: A group of student in vacation find themselves in a house where strange rituals were performed. The sudden finding of a doll bring the group on a downward spiral...

programme.title: Blue Hour
programme.desc: Olivia Brandreth was nine years old when her father disappeared. Twenty five years later, she has returned to her childhood home to finally get closure in an unrelenting attempt to set the record straight...

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: El Bosque del Diablo
programme.desc: Rachel y su equipo de cineastas viajan a Transilvania, Rumania, para documentar los fenómenos paranormales en el bosque de Hoia-Baciu...

programme.title: Mi Sangriento Cumpleaños
programme.desc: Tras un terrible trauma en su cumpleaños, Emma decide no volver a celebrarlo. Pero al cumplir 21, una amiga rompe el ritual con una fiesta sorpresa, sin percatarse del despertar de los horrores que durante años han estado acechando en la oscuridad...

programme.title: Caribe Sangriento
programme.desc: En un enfrentamiento entre policías y traficantes, una extraña fuerza se apodera de un hombre, concediéndole un super poder.

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: El Secuestro
programme.desc: Un joven con talento en la música sueña con ser un gran artista hasta que conoce al hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante colombiano quién promete ayudarlo a cambio de que trabaje para ellos. El joven no se imagina en que mundo se está metiendo. La fama le costará lo que más ama.

programme.title: El Tercer Deseo
programme.desc: Eugenio, un corredor de bienes raíces despierta en una esquina de la ciudad con una descomunal borrachera y descubre cerca una desportillada tetera de metal. La toma y manosea a ver si es de plata y, de pronto, se le aparece el espectro de un duende que le sugiere formule tres deseos. El genio desaparece sin dar oportunidad al tercer deseo. Mas tarde, descubre que los deseos le han sido concedidos pero de forma equivocada. La vida de Eugenio se complica, solo anhela reencontrar la tetera abandonada y pedir el tercer deseo.

programme.title: ¡Ni Te Me Acerques!
programme.desc: Él solo tenía que cuidar el hotel y teclear su novela, como Jack Nicholson en “El Resplandor”, pero de buen rollo. Y Llega la cuarentena y se queda le pilla en el Hotel Balneario de Ariño haciendo frente a la paranoia general, el acoso de las fuerzas del orden, las videollamadas de su novia, su madre y del conspiranoico Javi... Todos nos aburrimos mucho en el primer confinamiento. Juan no.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: La Llorona Siempre Vuelve
programme.desc: Una familia decide tomar unas vacaciones para olvidar la tragedia que habían vivido, sin imaginar que la maldición aún los alcanzaba.

programme.title: La Peste (Renaceremos de Nuestras Cenizas)
programme.desc: En un pueblito en donde reinaba la paz y tranquilidad un día inesperado sin saber cómo ni de donde cayó “La Peste” hundiendo a sus habitantes en la desolación y en la desesperanza, pero en medio de esa oscuridad surgirá un pequeño grupo de personas que ayudará a combatirla y a detenerla para siempre.

programme.title: Now What?
programme.desc: In “Now What?,” Pastor Holly Furtick explains that the outcome of your story is determined by how you respond to the problem — so stay present and see what God does next.

programme.title: OFF MENU
programme.desc: In “OFF MENU,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though we might not feel ready for this season of our lives, God has already prepared us for the exact assignment that we are designed to accomplish.

programme.title: Lame Excuses
programme.desc: In “Lame Excuses,” Pastor Robert Madu reminds us that we’ve got to stop making excuses and start walking in the purpose God has for us — because His power is made perfect in our weakness.

programme.title: The Pajamas Are A Prophecy
programme.desc: In “The Pajamas Are A Prophecy,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us of God’s promises to reach us where we are, wrap us with His care, and raise us to life.

programme.title: A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing
programme.desc: In “A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that even when we don’t see God moving, His hand still holds us steadily.
